description: Islanders endure their wettest July since 1987 and only once saw the mercury climb above 20C.
title: Isle of Man records its wettest July in 33 years
title_page: Isle of Man records its wettest July in 33 years - BBC News
maintext: Mr Young said that while the Manx weather would improve by the end of the week, "we won't see the high 20s that we see in headlines from southern England".
